casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America ex rel. Aristides GAROS, Relator-Appellant, v. Rudolph REIMER, Commissioner of Immigration, Respondent-Appellee. No. 390. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. July 5, 1938. James E. Wilkinson, of Brooklyn, N. Y., for appellant. Lamar Hardy, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Dolores C. Faconti, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
